abstract: The Eagles are 1-3, and they are so tragically flawed, so bumbling and inept at football basics, that they are easy prey for those who choose to mock the latest so-called Dream Team.
snippet: The Eagles are 1-3, and they are so tragically flawed, so bumbling and inept at football basics, that they are easy prey for those who choose to mock the latest so-called Dream Team.

headline.main: Eagles Are a Dream Team That Makes Fans Scream
headline.print_headline: The Eagles Never Dreamed It Could Go So Wrong
